form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screeneded by NARA, 7/13/2023, N-648 and related documents may also subject me to civil penalties under 8 U.S.C. Section 1324c.

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 4. Did the applicant's disability or impairment result from the illegal use of drugs? If the applicant is developmentally disabled, did this condition first manifest itself. before age 22? Please explain. NO THE QUESTION REGARDING DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITY IS NOT APPLICABLE 5. What is the duration of the applicant's- disability or impairment? \Is it temporary (less than 12 months) or permanent? Explain. THE IMPAIRMENT OF MRS. BOLANO IS PERMANENT AND PROGRESSIVE. SHE HAS AN IRREVERSIBLE BRAIN DAMAGE ON ACCOUNT OF HER BRAIN ATHEROSCLEROSIS 6. Please provide your medical specialty. If you are not specialized, provide your medical experience and GENERAL PRACTICE WITH 30 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE DURING MY PRACTICE I HAVE SEEN, DIAGNOSED AND TREATED PATIENTS SUCH AS MRS. BOLANOS FOR MANY YEARS. I certify under penalty or perjury under the laws of the United States of America, that the information on this form an any evidence submitted with it is all true and correct. I agree to release this applicant's relevant medical records upon request from the U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service. I am aware that the knowing placement of false information on the Form N-648 and related documents may also subject me to civil penalties under 8 U.S.C. Section 1324c. Signature Lyen n Decessions Date 12-9-98 Please Type or Print Last Name First Name Middle Name PLASENCIA LAZARO N Business Address City, State, ZIP Code Telephone 3850 SW 87TH AVE #104 MIAMI FL 33165 (305) ) 223-1551 License Number ME0049315 Licensing State FLORIDA
